text: The stir-fried cabbage with pork was well-seasoned. I requested no MSG, and it was prepared just as I liked: quite spicy, not too salty, and not oily. Iâ€™ll return to try other dishes.

Amazing Mala! Perfectly balanced spice and numbness, tender pork belly, and creamy cheese tofu. Plus, free eggs! 5/5 stars, reasonable price.

Mala! I think this hawker might have another location somewhere else. Whatever they are doing , they are doing well. One of my favorite dishes whenever I go to a mala place is to try their tomato egg dish (haha I know itâ€™s lame) cause I like the simplicity of the dish. Well they did that great and also this pork with quail egg, so fatty and heavenly melt in your mouth haha. They have all your favorite mala dishes (see the photo). I plan to try their other dishes but the if the ones we tried are any indication it will be the bomb ðŸ˜‹!
Food is ok. Not the best Sichuan food that I have eaten. But not bad, Can try.
